snippet: Kamchibek Tashiyev and two co-defendants are accused of inciting a crowd to attack government offices during a rally on Wednesday in the capital, Bishkek.
lead_paragraph: Kamchibek Tashiyev and two co-defendants are accused of inciting a crowd to attack government offices during a rally on Wednesday in the capital, Bishkek.

headline.main: Kyrgyzstan: Lawmakers Charged With Inciting Crowds
headline.print_headline: Kyrgyzstan: Lawmakers Charged With Inciting Crowds
